author: lamax6
title: Could have been better
review: I agree about the tiles, but think that bigger tires such as the one on 6681 Police Van would have made it better.  I added those to mine and added the "Ladder" grill to make it look a little tougher.

author: hustla187
title: Better than What Most Think
review: I got to be honest, but Lego cars from the 80's were very cool and designed perfectly. This is a pretty cool truck with a minifig and some signs. The signs could be useful for any Lego town and this set really deserves a 5.
